entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multiple "CodeStatements" for "CodeDom.CodeIterationStatement.IncrementStatement" possible? #68159
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.* trimming support #68154
    17.7
  • BUG: Expression is always false #68153

Closed

  • Roslyn IDE is flagging Enum objects in a inheriting c# files as an error. #67764
    17.7
  • Pattern-captured variable has a wrong value in C# 11 #67923
    17.7
  • Required Members VB Support #61435
    17.7
  • CS8602 in child class when in the construtor ensures the value of base class property won't be null #65753
    17.7
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67330
    17.7
  • Source Generators support AddSource with SyntaxNode for possible future perf improvements #68155
  • IDE1006 should not warn when name is all underscores #40713
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33709.525 #68152

PullRequests

Created

  • Enabled .NET remote host by default #68161
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add RequiresNonDocumentChangesTag to ProjectOptionsChangeAction #68160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods #68158
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Limit amount of tokens used to calculate LCS distance #68151
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #68149
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • IDE1006: Support multiple underscores #68086
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Feature - IDE1006, Next
  • Check if DocCookie is int instead of uint #68105
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • LSP.Range may request beyond length of file #68081
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods" #68157
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Make existing instance methods on BindingDiagnosticBag into extensions #68043
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods #68132
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove redundant hex digit validator from lexer #68016
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68150
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Add feature to help people move to using primary constructors. #68147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Initial support for collection literal spread elements #67942
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement member lookup for extension types #68137
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Implement more validation for inline array element access and conversion scenarios #68146
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Remove CS1701 and CS1702 warnings #66313
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Remove specialized C# and VB subtypes of BindingDiagnosticBag #68044
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use a singleton sentinel for empty type-parameters for non-generic named-types and methods. #68131
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on remaining analysis contexts #68052
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Report only warning for `ref` argument at `in` parameter #68087
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
